headline: Microchip Technology to lay off 2,000 employees
summary: The layoffs will affect its Fab 4 facility in Gresham, Oregon; Fab 5 facility in Colorado Springs, Colorado; and its backend manufacturing site in the Philippines.

headline: What’s News: Business & Finance
summary: WHATS NEWS BUSINESS FINANCE Major U.S. stock indexes slid as Trump confirmed that he would proceed with a 25% levy on Canadian and Mexican goods. The S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow fell 1.8%, 2.6% and 1.5%, respectively.

raw.headline: What’s News: Business & Finance
